Package civitas.celestis.graphics.raytracing

Class LightRay

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.raytracing.LightRay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ray
public class LightRay extends Object implements Ray
A ray of light. Light rays have a color and intensity.

    • LightRay

      public LightRay(@Nonnull Vector3 origin, @Nonnull Vector3 direction, double intensity)
      Creates a new light ray. The color will be set to RichColor.WHITE.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin of this ray
      direction - The direction of this ray
      intensity - The intensity of this ray
